articles.title: Google sued for at least $5 billion over claimed 'Incognito mode' grab of 'potentially embarrassing' browsing data - Tech Xplore

articles.title: Dropbox has quietly launched a new password manager in private beta - The Verge
articles.description: Dropbox has quietly launched a new password manager named Dropbox Passwords. The app is only available in a private beta on Android right now and offers basic features, like creating passwords, syncing them across devices, and autofilling login fields.
articles.content:
The app uses zero knowledge encryption to secure passwords
